original_title: Piff the Magic Dragon: Reptile Dysfunction
overview: Filmed at the Piff the Magic Dragon Theatre at the Flamingo Casino and on location in and around Las Vegas, this is Piff's debut hour starring Mr Piffles, Jade Simone, Francis the Squire and Penn Jillette as Pop the Magic Dragon.
title: Piff the Magic Dragon: Reptile Dysfunction
